Name: Apple Blossom Cocktail
Ingredients: 50 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of apple wedge or float dehydrated apple slice.
Prepare garnish of apple wedge or dehydrated apple slice.
Garnish with apple wedge on rim or float dehydrated apple slice.
Review: Concentrated lightly herbal apple with subtle zesty citrus. Quick to make and stupidly simple yet delicious.
History: Adapted from Victor Bergeron's Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (1972 revised edition).
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Blossom Cocktail contains 199 calories
